datafield.subfield: Program for the Reconstruction of Legal Ordering in the 21st Century
Program for the Reconstruction of Legal Ordering in the 21st Century
Kyoto journal of law and politics, Nov. 2004:

cover (Program for the Reconstruction of Legal Ordering in the 21st Century; Law and Politics 21 COE) p.2 of cover (Graduate School of Law, Kyoto University) p.8 (... "Program for the Reconstruction of Legal Ordering in the Twenty-first Century," which is being undertaken in the framework of the Ministry of Education's Center for Excellence, granted to our Graduate School of Law.)
